greetings:
What do you want?

Oh, it is you again.

Make it quick.
Back already? Pathetic.
Make this worth my time.
waiting:
What do I have to do now..
Well? I am waiting..
Any day now.
Still here, still unimpressed.
confirm:
Fine. I will remind you.
ow
Ugh, noted.
Do I look like your assistant? Whatever.
Right.. Do you really need me for this?
reminder:
Time is up. Not that I care.
Here is your reminder. Try not to waste my time next time.
error:
You messed up the command. Shocking.
Invalid. Obviously.
Garbage input. Even I could do better.
Wrong. Obviously. Start over.
Wow. You broke it. Impressive.
bot_wins:
I win. Obviously.
Too easy. You don’t stand a chance.
I win. Surprised?
user_wins:
You win. Do not get used to it.
I will let you have this one.
You win. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Lucky shot, I guess.
tie_game:
It’s a tie. How boring.
Neither of us wins. Yawn.
We’re evenly matched… for now.
